commit.message:
Update dependencies from https://github.com/NuGet/NuGet.Client build 5.9.0.7027

NuGet.Build.Tasks
 From Version 5.9.0-rc.7097 -> To Version 5.9.0-preview.3.7027

nodes.body: Subscription deleted. If I was wrong to do that, I can readd it.

Spoke to @zivkan, Nuget has not promoted the changes with the updated Maestro task yet. Once that is done, you will be able to see that the version is not downgrading.. I would just wait for that update and not merge this change.
@epananth - I lean towards closing this PR. We have not started any .NET insertion which has your PR https://github.com/NuGet/NuGet.Client/pull/3910.
closing this one till, Nuget is promoted to VS 16.9
